title: Bitcoin whales copy classic bull market moves as BTC price eyes $72K
description:
Bitcoin sets a positive tone into the U.S. holiday weekend as a Coinbase-induced BTC price dip fails to keep bulls back for long.

Bitcoin (BTC) sought higher levels at the week’s last Wall Street open as bulls refused to succumb to market nerves.

Data from Cointelegraph Markets Pro and TradingView followed resurgent BTC price action as it passed $71,000.

Flash volatility characterized the day prior as an ongoing legal battle between United States exchange Coinbase and regulator the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) sent Bitcoin below key $69,000 support.

Read more

title: Google dives deeper into blockchain adding Bitcoin, EVM chains to ‘rich results’ indexing
description:
Reports indicate that Google has expanded its search engine capabilities to include blockchain data from various networks, such as Bitcoin and Ethereum virtual machine networks like Fantom. This integration empowers users to access transaction details by searching for specific blockchain addresses directly within Google’s search engine ‘rich’ results. Last year, Google introduced this feature for […]

description: The United Arab Emirates (UAE) has emerged as a promising investment destination in recent years due to its economic diversity. Entrepreneurs and investors worldwide are now showing interest in the country as it has become one of the preferred destinations for business development.
